name: Triple Cheese Gluten-Free Jalapeno Poppers
author: Buckwheat Queen
summary: Three kinds of cheese and gluten-free bread crumbs make a delicious appetizer the whole family will love. The gluten free bread crumbs crisp up just like regular ones thanks to adding cotija cheese before baking.
ingredients: ¾ cup finely grated Cheddar cheese
½ cup finely shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Put on disposable gloves to remove the seeds and membranes
Mix goat cheese, Cheddar cheese, Monterey Jack, chili powder, cumin, and coriander until well combined
Mix bread crumbs, cotija, and oregano together in a separate bowl
Fill each jalapeno half with equal amounts of the goat cheese mixture
Gently roll the tops of the filled peppers in the bread crumb mixture
Arrange peppers on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until bread crumbs are browned, about 20 minutes
